committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing support for the designation of an Early Detection Month to enhance public awareness of the need for screening for breast cancer and all other forms of cancer.

summary.text: Expresses support for the designation of an Early Detection Month to enhance public awareness of the need for cancer screening.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing support for the designation of an Early Detection Month to enhance public awareness of the need for screening for breast cancer and all other forms of cancer.
